sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { TitleDescription } from "services/projects"; type SyllabusProps = { syllabus: TitleDescription, editSyllabus: (TitleDescription) => void toggle: () => void, index } export const SyllabusEdit: React.FC = ({ toggle, editSyllabus, syllabus, index }) => { const [ title, setTitle] = useState(syllabus?.title || '') const [ description, setDescription] = useState(syllabus?.description || '') return (
{ event.preventDefault() editSyllabus({ title, description, index }) toggle() }} className="item-form--item-form--2egBT">
 {`Section ${index + 1}:`}
setTitle(event.target.value)} className="form-control" value={title} />
{title.length}
setDescription(event.target.value)} value={description} id="description" className="form-control" />
{description.length}
); };
